column2: /əˈbӕndən/ v. từ bỏ. Eg: The bank robbers abandoned the stolen car.
/ˈӕbi/ n. tu viện. Eg: Westminster Abbey.
/əˈbiləti/ n. khả năng. Eg: She has the ability to win the race
/ӕbˈnoːməl/ adj. khác thường. Eg: His behaviour/behavior is abnormal for a child of his age.
/əˈboːd/ adv. ở trên. Eg: He made us really feel that his boat was our home while we were aboard
/əˈboliʃ/ v. huỷ bỏ. Eg: When was the death penalty abolished in this country?
/əˈbav/ preposition. bên trên. Eg: The picture was hanging above the fireplace.
/əˈbroːd/ adv. ở nước ngoài. Eg: He lived abroad for many years.
/əˈbrapt/ adj. bất thình lình. Eg: The car came to an abrupt halt.
n. sự vắng mặt. Eg: His absence from the training session was noticed by the boss.
/ˈӕbsənt/ adj. vắng mặt. Eg: Johnny was absent from school with a cold.
/əbˈzoːb/ v. thấm. Eg: The roots of the plant absorb water and nutrients from soil.
/ˈӕbstrӕkt/ adj. trừu tượng. Eg: Truth, poverty and bravery are abstract nouns.
/əbˈsəːd/ adj. ngớ ngẩn. Eg: These demands are absolutely absurd.
adj. nhiều. Eg: The police have abundant proof that he was involved in the crime.
/əˈbjuːz/ v. lạm dụng. Eg: He was accused of sexually abusing young boys.
/ӕkəˈdemik/ adj. thuộc trường đại học. Eg: an academic career.
/əˈkӕdəmi/ n. học viện. Eg: She is studying at the Academy of Music.
/əkˈseləreit/ v. tăng tốc. Eg: The taxi driver accelerated to pass the truck.
/ˈӕksənt/ n. giọng. Eg: She spoke with an American accent.
/əkˈsept/ v. chấp nhận. Eg: She graciously accepted the gift.
n. sự chấp thuận. Eg: the acceptance of a job offer.
/ˈӕkses/ n. đường vào. Eg: The thieves gained access to the house through a window.
/əkˈsesəri/ n. đồ phụ tùng. Eg: She wore matching accessories.
/ˈӕksidənt/ n. tai nạn. Eg: a car/road/traffic accident.
/əˈkomədeit/ v. cung cấp chỗ ở cho ai. Eg: The house could accommodate two families.
/əˈkampəni/ v. đi cùng. Eg: He accompanied her to the door.
/əˈkampliʃ, (American) -ˈkom-/ v. hoàn thành. Eg: He had accomplished everything he had intended to do.
adv. phù hợp với. Eg: Find out what has happened and act accordingly.
/əˈkaunt/ n. tài khoản. Eg: I have (opened) an account with the local bank.
adj. chịu trách nhiệm. Eg: He was held accountable for the disappearance of the money.
n. nhân viên kế toán. Eg: He employs an accountant to deal with his tax affairs.
/əˈkjuːmjuleit/ v. thu gom. Eg: Over the last few years he had accumulated a large amount of debt.
/ӕˈkjurət/ adj. đúng đắn. Eg: a technically accurate drawing of the building.
/əˈkjuːz/ v. buộc tội. Eg: They accused him of stealing the car.
/əˈkastəm/ v. làm quen. Eg: He soon accustomed himself to the idea.
/eik/ n. đau. Eg: I have an ache in my stomach.
/əˈtʃiːv/ v. đạt được. Eg: Steve achieved his ambition of becoming a pilot.
/ˈӕsid/ adj. chất chua. Eg: Lemons and limes are acid fruits.
/əkˈnolidʒ/ v. công nhận. Eg: He acknowledged defeat
/əˈkweint/ v. làm quen. Eg: You must acquaint yourself with the routine of the office.
/əˈkwaiə/ v. thu được. Eg: He acquired a lot of interesting antiques over the course of his life.
/ӕkwiˈziʃən/ n. sự giành được. Eg: The public support the acquisition of more land to protect wildlife.
/(British) ˈeikə, (American) ˈeikər/ n. mẫu Anh. Eg: 50,000 acres of land.
/ˈӕkrəbӕt/ n. diễn viên nhào lộn. Eg: Acrobats were swinging on a trapeze.
/əˈkros/ preposition. từ bên này sang bên kia. Eg: He helped the old lady across the road.
/ˈӕktiv/ adj. nhanh nhẹn. Eg: At seventy, he’s no longer very active.
/ˈӕktʃuəl/ adj. thực sự. Eg: What was the actual reason for the delay?
adv. thực sự. Eg: She actually saw the accident happen.
/əˈkjuːt/ adj. cấp tính. Eg: They think his illness is acute rather than chronic.
/əˈdӕpt/ v. sửa lại cho hợp. Eg: She always adapted easily to new circumstances
/ˈӕdikt/ n. người nghiện. Eg: a drug/television addict
/əˈdiktiv/ adj. gây nghiện. Eg: Nicotine is a highly addictive drug.
/ˈӕdikwət/ adj. đủ. Eg: He does not earn a large salary, but it is adequate for his needs.
/ədˈhiə/ v. bám. Eg: This tape doesn’t adhere (to the floor) very well.
/əˈdʒeisənt/ adj. liền kề. Eg: We had adjacent rooms in the hotel
/əˈdʒoin/ v. sát vách. Eg: His house adjoins the hotel.
adj. bên cạnh. Eg: an adjoining building.
/əˈdʒast/ v. điều chỉnh. Eg: He soon adjusted to his new way of life.
/ədˈministə/ v. quản lý. Eg: He administers the finances of the company.
n. sự quản lý. Eg: He’s in charge of administration at the hospital.
/-strətiv, (American) -streitiv/ adj. thuộc về quản lý. Eg: an administrative post
n. nhà quản lý. Eg: college/university administrators.
/ˈӕdmərəl/ n. đô đốc
n. sự cho phép vào. Eg: They charge a high price for admission.
/ədˈmoniʃ/ v. khiển trách. Eg: The judge admonished the young man for fighting in the street.
/ӕdəˈlesnt/ adj. vị thành niên. Eg: She spent her adolescent years in Spain.
/ˈӕdalt, (especially American) əˈdalt/ adj. trưởng thành. Eg: an adult gorilla.
/ədˈvaːns/ v. tiến về, phát triển. Eg: The army advanced towards the town
/ˈӕdvent/ n. sự đến. Eg: the advent of space travel.
/ədˈventʃə/ n. chuyến phiêu lưu. Eg: He wrote a book about his adventures in the Antarctic.
/ˈӕdvəːs/ adj. bất lợi. Eg: The book received a lot of adverse criticism.
/ˈӕdvətaiz/ v. quảng cáo. Eg: I’ve advertised (my house) in the newspaper
/ədˈvais/ n. lời khuyên. Eg: You must seek legal advice if you want a divorce
/ədˈvaiz/ v. khuyên. Eg: My lawyer advised me not to speak to any journalists.
/ˈӕdvəkət/ n. người ủng hộ. Eg: She is an advocate of reform.
/ˈeəriəl/ n. ăng-ten. Eg: a television aerial.
/esˈθetik/ adj. thuộc mỹ học. Eg: aesthetic considerations.
/əˈfeə/ n. sự việc. Eg: the Suez affair.
/əˈfekt/ v. ảnh hưởng. Eg: The amount of rain affects the growth of the plants
/əˈfekʃən/ n. yêu mến. Eg: I have great affection for her.
/ˈӕfluənt/ adj. giàu có. Eg: The restaurant is popular with affluent businessmen.
/əˈfoːd/ v. đủ khả năng làm gì. Eg: I can’t afford (to buy) a new car.
/əˈɡenst/ preposition. chống lại. Eg: They fought against the enemy
/eidʒ/ n. tuổi. Eg: He began learning piano at the age of six (years)
n. hãng. Eg: an advertising agency.
/əˈdʒendə/ n. chương trình hội nghị. Eg: What’s on the agenda this morning?
/ˈӕɡriɡət/ n. tổng số. Eg: What is the aggregate of goals from the two football matches?
n. thái độ gây gổ, cuộc xâm lược. Eg: Does your dog show aggression towards other dogs?
/əˈɡresiv/ adj. hung hăng. Eg: He’s a very aggressive boy who he is always fighting at school.
/ˈӕɡəni/ n. đau đớn. Eg: The dying man was in agony
/əˈɡriː/ v. đồng tình. Eg: I agreed with them that we should try again
n. sự đồng tình. Eg: We are all in agreement.
/ˈӕɡrikaltʃə/ n. nông nghiệp. Eg: He is studying agriculture at university.
/əˈhed/ adv. phía trước. Eg: He went on ahead of me
adj. ốm yếu. Eg: his ailing grandmother
/eim/ v. nhắm. Eg: He picked up the rifle and aimed it at the target.
n. máy bay. Eg: Enemy aircraft have been sighted.
n. hãng hàng không. Eg: The airline operates a regular service to New York.
n. đường thở. Eg: Open the patient’s mouth and clear the airway.
/ail/ n. lối đi giữa hai dãy ghế. Eg: On her father’s arm, the bride walked up the aisle.
/əˈlaːm/ n. báo động. Eg: Sound the alarm!
/oːlˈbiːit/ conjunction. mặc dù. Eg: He had spoken to her before, albeit only rarely.
/ˈӕlkəhol/ n. rượu cồn. Eg: Some people do not drink alcohol for religious reasons.
/əˈləːt/ adj. minh mẫn. Eg: She’s eighty years old, but still very alert.
/ˈeiliən/ adj. thuộc nước ngoài. Eg: They found themselves in an alien environment
/əˈlain/ v. sắp thẳng hàng. Eg: Align the two pieces of wood before joining them together.
/əˈlaik/ adj. giống nhau. Eg: Twins are often very alike.
/əˈlaiv/ adj. còn sống. Eg: Queen Victoria was still alive in 1900.
/əˈledʒ/ v. viện cớ. Eg: He alleged that Jones had been with the accused on the night of the murder.
/ˈӕli/ n. ngõ. Eg: a dark alley.
n. khối đồng minh. Eg: the alliance between Britain and the USA
/ˈӕləkeit/ v. cấp. Eg: He allocated a room to each student.
/əˈlau/ v. cho phép. Eg: He allowed me to enter
/əˈlai/ v. liên minh. Eg: Small countries often have to ally themselves with larger countries in order to survive.
/oːlˈmaiti/ adj. Toàn Năng. Eg: almighty God.
/ˈaːmənd/ n. cây hạnh nhân. Eg: The cake had raisins and almonds in it.
/əˈləun/ adv. một mình. Eg: He lived alone
/əˈloŋ/ preposition. dọc theo. Eg: He was walking along the street
adv. sát cạnh. Eg: He parked alongside a large truck
/əˈlaud/ adv. lớn tiếng. Eg: He read the letter aloud.
/oːlˈredi/ adv. đã…rồi. Eg: I had already gone when Tom arrived
/ˈoːlsəu/ adv. cũng. Eg: He is studying German but he is also studying French
/ˈoːltə/ n. bệ thờ. Eg: The bride and groom stood before the priest at the altar.
/ˈoːltə/ v. thay đổi. Eg: Will you alter this dress (to fit me)?
/ˈoːltəneit/ v. xen kẽ. Eg: Her mood alternates between highs and lows
/oːlˈtəːnətiv/ adj. có thể lựa chọn. Eg: An alternative arrangement can be made if my plans don’t suit you.
/oːlˈðəu/ conjunction. mặc dù. Eg: Although she was rich, she was not very happy.
/oːltəˈɡeðə/ adv. hoàn toàn. Eg: I’m not altogether satisfied.
/ˈoːlweiz/ adv. luôn luôn. Eg: I always work hard
/ˈӕmətə, (American) -tʃər/ n. vận động viên nghiệp dư. Eg: The tennis tournament was open only to amateurs.
/əˈmeiz/ v. hết sức ngạc nhiên. Eg: It amazes me how she manages to spend do much money on clothes.
/amˈbӕsədə/ n. Đại sứ. Eg: the British Ambassador to Italy.
/ӕmˈbiɡjuəs/ adj. mơ hồ. Eg: ‘After the cat caught the mouse, it died’ is an ambiguous statement because it is unclear whether ‘it’ refers to the cat or the mouse.
/ӕmˈbiʃən/ n. khát vọng. Eg: He is full of ambition and energy.
adj. tham vọng. Eg: He is very ambitious
/ˈӕmbjuləns/ n. xe cấp cứu. Eg: They had to call an ambulance.
/əˈmend/ v. sửa đổi. Eg: We will amend the error as soon as possible.
/əˈmid(st)/ preposition. ở giữa. Eg: Amid all the confusion, the real point of the meeting was lost
/ˈӕmnəsti/ n. sự ân xá. Eg: The prisoner was released under the amnesty declared by the new president.
/əˈmaŋ(st)/ preposition. ở giữa. Eg: I could see a small house among the trees.
/əˈmaunt/ v. lên tới. Eg: The bill amounted to $15.
/ˈӕmpl/ adj. rộng. Eg: There is ample space for four people inside the tent.
/əˈmjuːz/ v. làm cho ai cười. Eg: The children were amused by the monkey’s antics.
/əˈnæləɡəs/ adj. tương tự. Eg: The results of today’s test are analogous to the one conducted last week.
/ˈӕnsistə, (American) -ses-/ n. tổ tiên. Eg: They dream one day of returning to the land of their ancestors.
/ˈӕŋkə/ n. mỏ neo. Eg: a safe place to drop anchor.
/ˈeinʃənt/ adj. cổ đại. Eg: ancient history.
/əˈniuː/ adv. bắt đầu lại. Eg: He started his life anew in Spain.
/ˈӕŋɡl/ n. góc. Eg: an angle of 90.
/ˈӕniməl/ n. động vật. Eg: What are the differences between man and other animals?
/ˈӕnimeit/ v. làm sinh động. Eg: Joy animated his face.
/ˈӕŋkl/ n. mắt cá chân. Eg: She has broken her ankle.
/ӕnəˈvəːsəri/ n. lễ kỷ niệm. Eg: We celebrated our fifth wedding anniversary.
/əˈnauns/ v. công bố. Eg: Martha and John have announced their engagement.
/ˈӕnjuəl/ adj. hàng năm. Eg: The summer concert is an annual event.
/əˈnonəməs/ adj. khuyết tên. Eg: The donor wished to remain anonymous
/ˈӕnθəm/ n. quốc ca. Eg: a national anthem.
/ӕnθrəˈpolədʒi/ n. nhân loại học. Eg: He works for the university’s Department of Anthropology.
/ˌӕntibaiˈotik/ n. thuốc kháng sinh. Eg: Doctors can prescribe antibiotics for a variety of conditions.
/ӕnˈtisəpeit/ v. lường trước. Eg: I’m not anticipating any trouble.
/ӕnˈtiːk/ adj. cổ xưa. Eg: an antique chair.
/aŋˈzaiəti/ n. nỗi lo. Eg: His health is a great anxiety to me
/ˈӕŋkʃəs/ adj. lo lắng. Eg: She is anxious about her father’s health.
/əˈpaːt/ adv. cách nhau. Eg: The trees were planted three yards apart
/əˈpaːtmənt/ n. căn hộ. Eg: a luxury apartment.
n. lời xin lỗi. Eg: Please accept my apology for not arriving on time
/ӕpəˈreitəs/ n. dụng cụ. Eg: chemical/gymnastic apparatus.
/əˈpӕrənt/ adj. rõ ràng. Eg: It is quite apparent to all of us that you haven’t done your work properly.
/əːpiːl/ v. yêu cầu. Eg: She appealed (to him) for help.
/əˈpiə/ v. xuất hiện. Eg: A man suddenly appeared round the corner.
/ˈӕpitait/ n. sự ngon miệng. Eg: Exercise gives you a good appetite.
adj. làm cho ngon miệng. Eg: the appetizing smell of freshly baked bread.
/əˈploːd/ v. vỗ tay. Eg: The crowd applauded Jack’s speech enthusiastically.
n. sự hoan nghênh. Eg: The President received a round of applause at the end of his speech.
n. thiết bị. Eg: The company makes washing machines and other electrical appliances.
adj. có thể áp dụng được. Eg: This rule is not applicable (to you) any longer.
n. người xin việc. Eg: There were over two hundred applicants for the position.
/əˈplai/ v. đặt cái gì vào cái gì. Eg: She applied ointment to the cut.
/əˈpoint/ v. bổ nhiệm. Eg: They appointed him manager
/əˈpriːʃieit/ v. cảm kích. Eg: I appreciate all your hard work.
/əˈprentis/ n. người học việc. Eg: He joined the company as an apprentice.
/əˈprəutʃ/ v. đến gần. Eg: The car approached (the traffic lights) at top speed
/əˈprəupriət/ adj. phù hợp. Eg: You’ll have to complete the appropriate form.
/əˈpruːv/ v. tán thành. Eg: I approve of your decision.
/əˈproksimət/ adj. gần đúng. Eg: These figures are only approximate
/ˈeiprikot/ n. quả mơ
/ˈӕptitjuːd/ n. năng khiếu. Eg: Sophie has always had an aptitude for mathematics.
/əˈkweəriəm/ n. bể cá cảnh, khu nuôi cá
/əˈkwӕtik/ adj. dưới nước. Eg: aquatic plants/sports.
/ˈaːbitrəri/ adj. chuyên quyền. Eg: The council made a rather arbitrary decision to close the local library without consulting other people.
/aːk/ n. hình cung. Eg: Many methods have been used to measure the arc of a circle.
/aːtʃ/ n. mái vòm. Eg: the Marble Arch in London.
/aːkiˈolədʒi/ n. khảo cổ học. Eg: the university’s Department of Archaeology.
/(British) aːˈkeiik, (American) aːrˈkeiik/ adj. cổ. Eg: archaic language.
n. môn bắn cung
/ˈaːkitekt/ n. kiến trúc sư. Eg: a landscape architect.
n. công trình kiến trúc. Eg: He’s studying architecture
/ˈeəriə/ n. vùng. Eg: Do you live in this area?
/əˈriːnə/ n. đấu trường. Eg: a sports arena.
/ˈӕrid/ adj. khô cằn. Eg: The soil is very arid, which makes it difficult for crops to grow.
/əˈrest/ v. bắt giữ. Eg: The police arrested the thief.
/əˈraiv/ v. đến. Eg: They arrived home last night
/ˈӕrəɡənt/ adj. ngạo mạn. Eg: That kind of arrogant attitude will get him nowhere.
/ˈӕrəu/ n. mũi tên. Eg: You can’t get lost – just follow the arrows.
/aːt/ n. mỹ thuật. Eg: I’m studying art at college
/ˈaːtəri/ n. động mạch. Eg: As blood travels through the arteries, it pushes against the sides of these blood vessels.
/aːˈθraitis/ n. chứng viêm khớp. Eg: She suffers from arthritis.
/ˈaːtikl/ n. vật. Eg: This shop sells articles of all kinds
/aːˈtikjuleit/ v. phát âm rõ ràng. Eg: The teacher articulated (his words) very carefully.
/aːtiˈfiʃəl/ adj. nhân tạo. Eg: artificial flowers
/ˈaːtist/ n. hoạ sĩ. Eg: a landscape/portrait artist.
/ӕʃ/ n. tro. Eg: cigarette ash
/əˈʃeimd/ adj. xấu hổ. Eg: He was ashamed of his failure to live up to his parents’ expectations
/əˈʃoː/ adv. trên bờ. Eg: The sailors went ashore.
/əˈsaid/ adv. sang một bên. Eg: They stood aside to let her pass
/aːsk/ v. hỏi. Eg: He asked me what the time was
/ˈӕspekt/ n. khía cạnh. Eg: We must consider every aspect of the problem.
/əˈspaiə/ v. khao khát. Eg: He aspired to the position of president.
n. kẻ ám sát. Eg: a hired assassin.
/əˈsembl/ v. tụ tập. Eg: A crowd had assembled in the hall.
n. hội nghị. Eg: a legislative assembly
/əˈses/ v. ước định. Eg: Can you assess my chances of winning?
/ˈӕset/ n. vật quí. Eg: He is a great asset to the school.
/əˈsain/ v. phân công. Eg: They assigned the task to us.
n. nhiệm vụ. Eg: You must complete this assignment by tomorrow.
/əˈsiməleit/ v. tiêu hoá. Eg: Plants assimilate food from the earth
/əˈsist/ v. hỗ trợ. Eg: The junior doctor assisted the surgeon during the operation.
/əˈsəusieit/ v. liên tưởng. Eg: He always associated the smell of tobacco with his father.
/əˈsjuːm/ v. giả thiết rằng. Eg: I assume (that) you’d like time to decide.
/əˈʃuə/ v. cam đoan. Eg: I assured him (that) the repairs would be completed on time.
/ˈæstəˌroid/ n. tiểu hành tinh. Eg: Asteroids sometimes collide with each other.
/əˈstoniʃ/ v. làm ngạc nhiên. Eg: I was astonished by his ignorance.
/əˈstrolədʒi/ n. thuật chiêm tinh. Eg: She doesn’t believe in astrology.
/ˈӕstrənoːt/ n. nhà du hành vũ trụ. Eg: Who was the first astronaut to land on the moon?
/əˈstronəmi/ n. thiên văn học. Eg: He is studying astronomy.
/ˈӕθliːt/ n. vận động viên điền kinh. Eg: Hundreds of athletes participated in the games.
/ˈӕtməsfiə/ n. lớp khí quyển. Eg: The atmosphere above the city is heavily polluted.
/ˈӕtəm/ n. nguyên tử. Eg: There’s not an atom of truth in what she says.
/əˈtӕtʃ/ v. gắn. Eg: I attached a label to my bag.
/əˈtӕk/ v. tấn công. Eg: He attacked me with a knife
/əˈtein/ v. đạt được. Eg: He attained all his ambitions.
/əˈtempt/ v. cố gắng. Eg: He attempted to reach the dying man, but did not succeed
/əˈtend/ v. tham gia. Eg: She attended the meeting
/əˈtenʃən/ n. sự chú ý. Eg: He tried to attract my attention
/ˈӕtik/ n. phòng áp mái. Eg: They store old furniture in the attic.
/əˈtaiə/ n. quần áo. Eg: The guests were all dressed in formal attire.
/ˈӕtitjuːd/ n. quan điểm. Eg: What is your attitude to politics?
/əˈtəːni/ n. người được uỷ quyền. Eg: You have a right to an attorney in a criminal case.
/əˈtrӕkt/ v. thu hút. Eg: A magnet attracts iron
/əˈtribjut/ v. gán cho là. Eg: The play is attributed to Shakespeare.
/ˈoːdebl/ adj. nghe rõ. Eg: When the microphone broke her voice was barely audible.
/ˈoːdiəns/ n. khán thính giả. Eg: There was an audience of at least 4000 people at the concert
/ˈoːdit/ n. kiểm toán. Eg: An audit of the company’s finances is currently being carried out.
/oːdiˈtoːriəm/ n. thính phòng. Eg: The auditorium was packed with cheering fans.
/oːˈɡast/ adj. oai phong. Eg: The Vice-President’s visit was an august occasion.
/aːnt/ n. cô. Eg: My Aunt Anne died last week
/oːˈθentik/ adj. đích thực. Eg: an authentic signature.
/ˈoːθə/ n. tác giả. Eg: He used to be a well-known author but his books are out of print now
/-tətiv, (American) -teitiv/ adj. có thẩm quyền. Eg: an authoritative opinion.
/oːˈθorəti/ n. quyền lực. Eg: He gave me authority to act on his behalf.
